snippet: Sebastian Kienle of Germany won the Ironman World Championship for the first time, beating second-place Ben Hoffman, an American, by more than five minutes in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii.
abstract: Sebastian Kienle of Germany wins Ironman World Championship for first time, in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii.
lead_paragraph: Sebastian Kienle of Germany won the Ironman World Championship for the first time, beating second-place Ben Hoffman, an American, by more than five minutes in Kailua-Kona, Hawaii.
